about_the_game:
【 Real random fairy repair game 】
The events that take place inside are not linearly fixed, and if the face is black, it may be played to crash.
【 Multi-genre play 】
You can choose different routes to reach Tenzun, and you need to reasonably control the resources at your disposal to complete the breakthrough.
【 Multi-magic weapon collocation 】
All kinds of effects bloom, whether to use a high-level magic weapon, or to use a magic weapon suitable for their own, it is all up to themselves.
【 Multi-talu Dan drug 】
Hundreds of kinds of talisdan medicine collection use, attention, the opportunity is only once, do not mean their hands can save the guy.
【 Multi-breakthrough growth 】
Hundreds of breakthrough growth can be chosen, with the right day after tomorrow to achieve a different life.
【 High growth game 】
At present, the game is still in the early stages of production, more new content and new gameplay are gradually added, and each update has a new experience.
【 Repeat and play, break through oneself 】
The game provides many different experiences to bring more than 50 hours of extreme experience, as the only inheriting disciple of Taigong Gate, can you find the truth of the conflict between Taigong and Yuanshi Tianzun in the Yuan Xu world? The plot is gradually filled, to uncover the secret of this unknown.
Breaking through Heaven is just the beginning, but not reaching Heaven needs to continue to work hard.

name: 太公传承

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: A relaxed casual repair fairy game, suitable for leisure time to open a light pigeon game. You can play as a disciple brought up by Jiang Ziya and experience the life of a practitioner without the aura of the main character in an overhead world.
